game.name: The Underdog
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: “Underdog” is a hardcore side-scrolling action roguelike by a 2-person team. Play as a medieval mercenary: take deadly contracts in abandoned villages/dungeons, fight for gold to upgrade gear, and feel "dancing on a blade" intensity in every battle.
